Ah Tracy, I didn't realize you were in Yorkshire. We
have a friend from
there who is a dear soul, but we can hardly understand
a word he says when
he visits (it's a bit easier via email <grin>). The
last time he came over
my son was 2 and dubbed him "Mick from Morkshire" :-)

Blue Skies!
 -Robin-

There's a lot of it abaht, tha'knows :-) My MIL's
known as the eccentric English person when she visits
bil in Va (well, DC suburbs...) she walks to the
shops...

Tracy

messages.subject: Dialect, was Re: Eucalyptus
messages.msgSnippet: ... Ah Tracy, I didn t realize you were in Yorkshire. We have a friend from there who is a dear soul, but we can hardly understand a word he says when he
messages.messageBody:
> From: "Tracy Oldfield" <tracy.oldfield@...>
> Please don't stop using slang, cos then I'll have to
> stop educatin' y'all in West Yorkshire dialect *grin*


Ah Tracy, I didn't realize you were in Yorkshire. We have a friend from
there who is a dear soul, but we can hardly understand a word he says when
he visits (it's a bit easier via email <grin>). The last time he came over
my son was 2 and dubbed him "Mick from Morkshire" :-)

Blue Skies!
-Robin-
Mom to Mackenzie (8/28/96) "My pants are outgrowing me"
and Asa (10/5/99) "Potty pee! Potty pee! Potty pee!"
http://www.geocities.com/the_clevengers Flying Clevenger Family
